name: Bow Hit Fruit: Shooting Sport
description:
Bow Hit Fruit: Shooting Sport is for free which improves your focus and shooting skills level. Take accurate shots to smash all the Watermelon with Archery Bows. In this archery simulator game while crushing fruits with arrows you need to stay focused on target.
Features
- Different 30 levels with different environment
- Real shooting at army training camp
- Realistic crushing and smash sound
- Real broken blast with 3D animation
- Aim and smash the fruits
- Arcade and time attack mode
